description: Decimal expansion of sqrt(2) truncated to n places.
references: W. Rudin, Principles of Mathematical Analysis, 3rd ed., McGraw-Hill, 1976.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: With[{sqrt2=N[Sqrt[2],30]},Table[IntegerPart[sqrt2 10^n],{n,0,20}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 22 2011 *)IntegerPart[Table[N[Sqrt[2], k] 10^(k - 1), {k, 20}]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 16 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
